metadata.title: Human Bocavirus Infection among Children, Jordan

abstract.original_text: Human bocavirus was detected in 57 (18.3%) of 312 children with acute respiratory infection (ARI) who required hospitalization in Jordan. It was also detected in 30 (21.7%) of 138 children with severe ARI, in 27 (15.5%) of 174 with mild or moderate disease, and in 41 (72%) of 57 with other pathogens.

sentences.segment_text: Human bocavirus was detected in 57 ( 18.3 % ) of 312 children with acute respiratory infection ( ARI ) who required hospitalization in Jordan .
It was also detected in 30 ( 21.7 % ) of 138 children with severe ARI ,
in 27 ( 15.5 % ) of 174 with mild or moderate disease ,
and in 41 ( 72 % ) of 57 with other pathogens .
